Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Electronic \E`lec*tron"ic\, a. (Physics & Chem.) 1. Of or pertaining to an electron or electrons; as, electronic energy. [WordNet sense 2] [Webster 1913 Suppl.]
2. Using the methods or principles of {electronics} as part of the working mechanism; -- of devices; as, electronic circuit; electronic devices; electronic entertainment devices. [PJC]
3. Using computerized storage or transmission of information; as, electronic banking; electronic mail; electronic fund transfer. [PJC]
4. of or pertaining to electronics. [WordNet sense 1] [WordNet 1.5]

electronic adj 1: of or relating to electronics; concerned with or using devices that operate on principles governing the behavior of electrons; "electronic devices" 2: of or concerned with electrons; "electronic energy"
